articles.title: Marnus reveals ugly plan to get out-of-form Smith firing again - Fox Sports
articles.description: Watch the New Year’s Test between Australia and India LIVE on Fox Cricket, coverage starts Thursday at 9:30am AEDT!
articles.content:
Marnus Labuschagne has said there is no reason to panic over Steve Smiths form slump, despite the fact he has failed to register double figures against India this summer.
